title: Which newspaper can publish paid articles? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any newspaper can publish paid articles. Any readers can easily identify paid one. Promotional articles usually not entertained by editors. Even leading national newspapers like hindu, times of india publish paid but in favour of advt . If it's 100%promotional it will be mentioned as *advt in small below to the advertorial.

US-based answer: What's called “native advertising” has been pretty common in US papers for several years. Those would be ads that look like newspaper news stories — they have a headline and body text and are written in newspaper style, but are advertisements. Typically they'll be in a slightly different headline and body copy font, and there also will be a little border around them labeled “advertisement,” to make it hopefully clear to the reader.
